author: chestnut
msg: replaces the SourceWritingTransformer with a flow approach that uses
the processPipelineTo() method of the cocoon flow object. When exiting the flow
a plain status code is sent back to the browser.
Thanks to a patch by Felix Röthenbacher

author: slive
msg: Provide a kludgy technique for getting xml output from
the mirror system by ending the filename with --xml.cgi
